events.message: We have received the application from the candidate for the software engineer position in our backend team.
The application was reviewed and categorized under the engineering department focusing on backend development roles.
A recruiter specialized in engineering roles has been assigned to manage the candidate's recruitment process.
The initial screening call was completed successfully, and the candidate showed strong knowledge of software development.
The candidate responded promptly and expressed enthusiasm about proceeding to the technical interview stage.
The technical interview has been scheduled for next week to assess the candidate's programming and problem-solving skills.
The candidate performed very well during the technical interview, demonstrating strong expertise in backend software engineering.
An HR interview has been scheduled to discuss the candidate's cultural fit and employment terms.
The HR interview went smoothly, and the candidate expressed strong interest in joining the company.
An employment offer was formally proposed to the candidate, including details about compensation and benefits.
The candidate provided positive feedback regarding the offer and asked a few clarifying questions about the role.
The candidate accepted the employment offer enthusiastically, confirming their start date next month.
The onboarding process has started for the new software engineer, including setup of workstations and access credentials.
The recruitment process for the software engineer position is now closed successfully with the candidate fully onboarded.
